role_addRoleRoleInfo_text: Empower your team with precise role assignments. Use this form to create a new role and allocate the right users to it, ensuring optimal collaboration and efficiency.
role_addRoleUsersList_text: Unlock team potential by assigning tailored roles. Choose users from the list to align responsibilities and foster seamless collaboration.
role_editRoleRolePermissions_text: Edit role permissions easily to set access levels and improve workflow efficiency.
role_deleteRole_confirmMessage: This action is permanent and cannot be undone! Deleting this role will unassign it from all users, affecting their permissions and access.
role_addRoleWithoutUser_warning: The role has been successfully added, though no users are currently assigned to it.
role_addRoleWithUser_success: The role has been successfully added and users are assigned to it.
role_addRoleButNoPermissionForUsers_info: The role has been created successfully, but you do not have the permission to assign it to users.
role_roleUpdate_success: The role details has been updated successfully.
role_roleUpdate_failed: The is an error in updating the role.
roleName_required_message: Role Name should not be empty.
